00018 #ifndef CSWORDMODULEINFO_H
00019 #define CSWORDMODULEINFO_H
00020 
00021 //BibleTime includes
00022 #include "cswordbackend.h"
00023 #include "frontend/cpointers.h"
00024

00026 #include <qstring.h>
00027 #include <qfont.h>
00028 #include <qmap.h>

00030 
00031 //Sword includes
00032 #include <listkey.h>
00033 #include <swversion.h>
00034 
00035 class SWModule;
00036 class CSwordBackend;
00037 class CEntryDisplay;
00038 
00047 class CSwordModuleInfo : public CPointers  {
00048 public:
00049   enum TextDirection { /* The text direction of the modules's text */
00050     LeftToRight,
00051     RightToLeft
00052   };
00053   enum ModuleType {
00054         Bible,
00055         Commentary,
00056         Lexicon,
00057         GenericBook,
00058         Unknown
00059     };
00064   enum UnlockErrorCode {
00065         noError,    /* No error occured, everything worked ok. The key was written to the config*/
00066         wrongUnlockKey, /* The wrong key was used. Module is not unlocked */                
00067         notLocked, /* The module was not locked so it can't be unlocked */
00068         noPermission /* The key was not written to config because we have no permissions*/
00069     };  
00070     enum ConfigEntry {
00071         AboutInformation, /* The about information of a module which is stored in the config file*/
00072         AbsoluteDataPath, /* The absolute data path stored in the config object */
00073         CipherKey, /* The cipher key which was used to unlock the module. Not necessarily set.*/
00074         DataPath, /* The relative path. See AbsoluteDataPath*/
00075         Description, /* The module decsription stored in the config file */
00076         ModuleVersion, /* The module's version.*/
00077         MinimumSwordVersion, /* The required Sword Version of this module. Otherwise some things may not work (compression etc.).*/
00078       TextDir,  
00079     DisplayLevel /* Mostly used for books. Gives the level which should contain the connected entries.*/
00080     };
00081     enum Feature {
00082         StrongsNumbers, /*Use for Bibles which have embedded strong numbers*/
00083         GreekDef, /*Hebrew StringsNumbers definitions in a lexicon*/
00084         HebrewDef,
00085         GreekParse,
00086         HebrewParse,
00087         DailyDevotional,
00088         Glossary
00089     };
00090     
00094     const QString config( const ConfigEntry );
00095     
00096     CSwordModuleInfo( SWModule* module );
00097     CSwordModuleInfo( const CSwordModuleInfo& m );  
00098   virtual CSwordModuleInfo* clone();    
00099     virtual ~CSwordModuleInfo();    
00100 
00104   SWModule* const module() const;
00109   const CSwordModuleInfo::UnlockErrorCode unlock( const QString& unlockKey );
00117   CEntryDisplay* const getDisplay() const;
00123   const bool isEncrypted() const;
00128   const bool isLocked();
00129 
00133   const bool hasVersion() const;
00139   virtual const bool search( const QString searchedText, const int searchOptions, ListKey scope, void (*percent)(char, void*));
00144   virtual ListKey& searchResult( const ListKey* newResult = 0 );
00148   virtual void interruptSearch();
00154   void clearSearchResult();
00158   virtual const CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType type() const;
00163   const SWVersion minimumSwordVersion();
00167   const QString name() const;
00171   const bool isUnicode();
00176   virtual const bool snap() {return false;};
00177   const bool has( const CSwordModuleInfo::Feature );
00178     const bool has( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option ) ;
00182   virtual const CSwordModuleInfo::TextDirection textDirection();
00183 
00184 private:
00185     SWModule*   m_module;
00186     ListKey m_searchResult;
00187     struct {
00188         QString name;
00189         bool isUnicode;
00190     } m_dataCache;  
00191 };
00192 
00193 typedef QPtrList<CSwordModuleInfo>  ListCSwordModuleInfo;
00194 
00195 inline const CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType CSwordModuleInfo::type() const {
00196     return CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown;
00197 }
00198 
00199 inline SWModule*const CSwordModuleInfo::module() const {
00200     return m_module;
00201 }
00202 
00203 typedef QPtrList<CSwordModuleInfo> ListCSwordModuleInfo;
00204 
00205 #endif
